title: [feature request] RePr convolution method
body_html:
🚀 Feature

Implementation of RePr as a toggleable option for convolutional layers.

Motivation

RePr appears to promote a good improvement to generalization speed for general use.

Additional context

Arxiv Link: RePr: Improved Training of Convolutional Filters

body:
## 🚀 Feature
<!-- A clear and concise description of the feature proposal -->
Implementation of RePr as a toggleable option for convolutional layers.

## Motivation

<!-- Please outline the motivation for the proposal. Is your feature request related to a problem? e.g., I'm always frustrated when [...]. If this is related to another GitHub issue, please link here too -->

RePr appears to promote a good improvement to generalization speed for general use.

## Additional context

<!-- Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here. -->

Arxiv Link: [RePr: Improved Training of Convolutional Filters](https://arxiv.org/pdf/1811.07275.pdf)
